ayah_english: About what are they asking one another
About what are they asking one another
About the News the Great
About the News the Great
About the News the Great
(About) which they (are) concerning it (in) disagreement
(About) which they (are) concerning it (in) disagreement
(About) which they (are) concerning it (in) disagreement
(About) which they (are) concerning it (in) disagreement
Nay! Soon they will know
Nay! Soon they will know
Then Nay! soon they will know
Then Nay! soon they will know
Then Nay! soon they will know
Have not We made the earth a resting place
Have not We made the earth a resting place
Have not We made the earth a resting place
Have not We made the earth a resting place
And the mountains (as) pegs
And the mountains (as) pegs
And We created you (in) pairs
And We created you (in) pairs
And We made your sleep (for) rest
And We made your sleep (for) rest
And We made your sleep (for) rest
And We made the night (as) covering
And We made the night (as) covering
And We made the night (as) covering
And We made the day (for) livelihood
And We made the day (for) livelihood
And We made the day (for) livelihood
And We constructed over you seven strong
And We constructed over you seven strong
And We constructed over you seven strong
And We constructed over you seven strong
And We placed a lamp burning
And We placed a lamp burning
And We placed a lamp burning
And We sent down from the rain clouds water pouring abundantly
And We sent down from the rain clouds water pouring abundantly
And We sent down from the rain clouds water pouring abundantly
And We sent down from the rain clouds water pouring abundantly
And We sent down from the rain clouds water pouring abundantly
That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
And gardens (of) thick foliage
And gardens (of) thick foliage
Indeed (the) Day (of) the Judgment is an appointed time
Indeed (the) Day (of) the Judgment is an appointed time
Indeed (the) Day (of) the Judgment is an appointed time
Indeed (the) Day (of) the Judgment is an appointed time
Indeed (the) Day (of) the Judgment is an appointed time

ayah: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yunfakhu fi al-suri fatatuna afwajan
ayah_english: (The) Day is blown in the trumpet and you will come forth (in) crowds

ayah: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yunfakhu fi al-suri fatatuna afwajan

ayah_translit: yawma yunfakhu fi al-suri fatatuna afwajan
ayah_english: (The) Day is blown in the trumpet and you will come forth (in) crowds
And is opened the heaven and becomes gateways
And is opened the heaven and becomes gateways
And is opened the heaven and becomes gateways
And is opened the heaven and becomes gateways
And are moved the mountains and become a mirage
And are moved the mountains and become a mirage
And are moved the mountains and become a mirage
And are moved the mountains and become a mirage
Indeed Hell is lying in wait
Indeed Hell is lying in wait
Indeed Hell is lying in wait
Indeed Hell is lying in wait
For the transgressors a place of return
For the transgressors a place of return
(They will) be remaining therein (for) ages
(They will) be remaining therein (for) ages
(They will) be remaining therein (for) ages

ayah: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا
ayah_translit: la yadhuquna fiha bardan wala sharaban
ayah_english: Not they will taste therein coolness and not any drink

ayah: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا
ayah_translit: la yadhuquna fiha bardan wala sharaban

ayah_translit: la yadhuquna fiha bardan wala sharaban
ayah_english: Not they will taste therein coolness and not any drink
Except scalding water and purulence
Except scalding water and purulence
Except scalding water and purulence
A recompense appropriate
A recompense appropriate
Indeed they were not expecting an account
Indeed they were not expecting an account
Indeed they were not expecting an account
Indeed they were not expecting an account
Indeed they were not expecting an account
And denied Our Signs (with) denial
And denied Our Signs (with) denial
And denied Our Signs (with) denial
And every thing We have enumerated it (in) a Book
And every thing We have enumerated it (in) a Book
And every thing We have enumerated it (in) a Book
And every thing We have enumerated it (in) a Book
So taste and never We will increase you except (in) punishment
So taste and never We will increase you except (in) punishment
So taste and never We will increase you except (in) punishment
So taste and never We will increase you except (in) punishment
So taste and never We will increase you except (in) punishment
Indeed for the righteous (is) success
Indeed for the righteous (is) success
Indeed for the righteous (is) success
Gardens and grapevines
Gardens and grapevines
And splendid companions well-matched
And splendid companions well-matched
And a cup full
And a cup full

ayah: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّـٰبٗا
ayah_translit: la yasma'una fiha laghwan wala kidhaban
ayah_english: Not they will hear therein any vain talk and not any falsehood

ayah: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا
ayah_translit: rabbi al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma al-rahmani la yamlikuna min'hu khitaban
ayah_english: Lord (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them the Most Gracious not they have power from Him (to) address

ayah: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yaqumu al-ruhu wal-malaikatu saffan la yatakallamuna illa man adhina lahu al-rahmanu waqala sawaban
ayah_english: (The) Day will stand the Spirit and the Angels (in) rows not they will speak except (one) who permits [for] him the Most Gracious and he (will) say (what is) correct

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا

ayah_translit: yawma yaqumu al-ruhu wal-malaikatu saffan la yatakallamuna illa man adhina lahu al-rahmanu waqala sawaban
ayah_english: (The) Day will stand the Spirit and the Angels (in) rows not they will speak except (one) who permits [for] him the Most Gracious and he (will) say (what is) correct

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yaqumu al-ruhu wal-malaikatu saffan la yatakallamuna illa man adhina lahu al-rahmanu waqala sawaban
ayah_english: (The) Day will stand the Spirit and the Angels (in) rows not they will speak except (one) who permits [for] him the Most Gracious and he (will) say (what is) correct

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yaqumu al-ruhu wal-malaikatu saffan la yatakallamuna illa man adhina lahu al-rahmanu waqala sawaban
ayah_english: (The) Day will stand the Spirit and the Angels (in) rows not they will speak except (one) who permits [for] him the Most Gracious and he (will) say (what is) correct

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
ayah_translit: dhalika al-yawmu al-haqu faman shaa ittakhadha ila rabbihi maaban
ayah_english: That (is) the Day the True So whoever wills let him take towards his Lord a return

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

ayah_english: That (is) the Day the True So whoever wills let him take towards his Lord a return

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا
ayah_translit: inna andharnakum adhaban qariban yawma yanzuru al-maru ma qaddamat yadahu wayaqulu al-kafiru yalaytani kuntu turaban
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] have warned you (of) a punishment near (the) Day will see the man what have sent forth his hands and will say the disbeliever O I wish I were dust!

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا
